name: Last Chance
description:
Verse 1
My relationships turn to shit, I'm always on my selfish shit,
Even though I know I gotta selfless girl, who loves me more than she loves herself,
and I never take the time to realize what's her worth,
Maybe I just take some things for granted but if it's new gear it's like oh man,
I gotta have it, and that's the problemo, this is no bueno, I didn't the memo,
Somebody send help I need a lifeguard, come on cupid shoot another arrow,
I'm tired I'm tired of breaking her heart, and I don't wanna part,
I feel like a car and the motors bout to blow it's a standard,
headed up the hill just to drop down backwards, let the fire burst into flames,
and let it burn into ashes.

Chorus
This might be my last chance, this might be my last dance,
should I switch it up, change the pace, switch my stance,
This might be a glance into my past,
This might be my last chance, this might be my last dance,
should I switch it up, grip my pants, change the pace, switch my stance,
this might be a glance into my past.

Verse 2
The choice of a second chance is more likely,
but another chance of fvcking up is more like me,
I cant sing I'm always off key,
I never knew how to love no one taught me,
My mother left me for my stepdad,
and my father played the role of my best friend,
My best friends my dad and he's my mentor so
let the story begin,
Na. you never taught me how to love, I guess that's one thing
you don't do as a monk, you give me advice, say bye then hang up,
I'm the growing tree, I'm your seed, I'm your son, I'm the bullet,
your the gun, im what you bleed, im your blood, but what if
I told you there's another one, and I got to get her back because
my heart is the universe, I'm the moon she's the sun.

Chorus
This might be my last chance, this might be my last dance,
should I switch it up, change the pace, switch my stance,
This might be a glance into my past,
This might be my last chance, this might be my last dance,
should I switch it up, grip my pants, change the pace, switch my stance,
this might be a glance into my past.
